+#pragma once
+
+#include <JuceHeader.h>
+
+#include "AudioEngine.h"
+#include "ComponentPack.h"
+#include "LayerCompositor.h"
+
+namespace monument::playground
+{
+class MainComponent : public juce::Component, private juce::Timer
+{
+public:
+    MainComponent();
+    ~MainComponent() override;
+
+    void paint(juce::Graphics& g) override;
+    void resized() override;
+
+private:
+    void timerCallback() override;
+    void loadComponentPack();
+    juce::File locateAssetRoot() const;
+
+    juce::AudioDeviceManager audioDeviceManager;
+    AudioEngine audioEngine;
+
+    LayerCompositor preview;
+    ComponentPack componentPack;
+
+    juce::Slider valueSlider;
+    juce::Slider modulationSlider;
+    juce::Slider gainSlider;
+    juce::Slider frequencySlider;
+    juce::Slider noiseSlider;
+    juce::ToggleButton audioToggle;
+    juce::ToggleButton alphaDebugToggle;
+
+    juce::Label statusLabel;
+    juce::Label fpsLabel;
+    juce::Label repaintLabel;
+
+    juce::SmoothedValue<float> smoothedValue;
+    juce::SmoothedValue<float> smoothedGlow;
+    juce::SmoothedValue<float> smoothedPeak;
+    juce::SmoothedValue<float> smoothedCentroid;
+
+    int repaintCounterLast{0};
+    double lastFrameMs{0.0};
+    double fpsWindowStartMs{0.0};
+    int framesSinceLast{0};
+};
+}  // namespace monument::playground
diff --git a/playground/PlaygroundApp.cpp b/playground/PlaygroundApp.cpp
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..70eed5a7d0ab0c3b7b198a9aef0c9f064ab27aa1
--- /dev/null
+++ b/playground/PlaygroundApp.cpp
@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+#include <JuceHeader.h>
+
+#include "MainComponent.h"
+
+namespace monument::playground
+{
+class PlaygroundApplication : public juce::JUCEApplication
+{
+public:
+    PlaygroundApplication() = default;
+
+    const juce::String getApplicationName() override { return "Monument UI Playground"; }
+    const juce::String getApplicationVersion() override { return "0.1.0"; }
+    bool moreThanOneInstanceAllowed() override { return true; }
+
+    void initialise(const juce::String&) override
+    {
+        mainWindow = std::make_unique<MainWindow>(getApplicationName());
+    }
+
+    void shutdown() override
+    {
+        mainWindow = nullptr;
+    }
+
+    void systemRequestedQuit() override
+    {
+        quit();
+    }
+
+    void anotherInstanceStarted(const juce::String&) override
+    {
+    }
+
+private:
+    class MainWindow : public juce::DocumentWindow
+    {
+    public:
+        explicit MainWindow(const juce::String& name)
+            : juce::DocumentWindow(name,
+                                   juce::Colour(0xff0b0d10),
+                                   juce::DocumentWindow::allButtons)
+        {
+            setUsingNativeTitleBar(true);
+            setContentOwned(new MainComponent(), true);
+            centreWithSize(getWidth(), getHeight());
+            setResizable(true, true);
+            setVisible(true);
+        }
+
+        void closeButtonPressed() override
+        {
+            juce::JUCEApplication::getInstance()->systemRequestedQuit();
+        }
+    };
+
+    std::unique_ptr<MainWindow> mainWindow;
+};
+}
+
+START_JUCE_APPLICATION(monument::playground::PlaygroundApplication)
diff --git a/playground/README.md b/playground/README.md
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..81c9befe83dd85c28b305086ef2d44a83d599dad
--- /dev/null
+++ b/playground/README.md
@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+# Monument UI Playground
+
+A standalone JUCE application that exercises the photoreal, layered UI rendering stack and its
+animation/audio-reactive systems. This app is intentionally **not** a plugin UI â€” it is a visual
+systems testbed for future plugin integration.
+
+## Goals
+- Layered RGBA compositing (no flattened textures)
+- Strict alpha discipline with debug overlays
+- PBR-style layer passes (albedo, AO, roughness, glow)
+- Audio-reactive animation driven by realtime analysis
+- Deterministic, parameter-smoothed motion curves
+- Performance-safe repaint architecture
+
+## Build
+The app is built alongside the plugin as the `MonumentPlayground` target.
+
+```sh
+cmake -S . -B build -G Xcode -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=arm64
+cmake --build build --config Release --target MonumentPlayground
+```
+
+## Runtime Notes
+- The component pack is loaded from `assets/knob_geode/manifest.json` at runtime.
+- The PNGs in `assets/knob_geode/` are placeholder copies of existing test art and should be
+  replaced with real photoreal assets.
+
+## Controls
+- **Value**: knob parameter value
+- **Modulation Depth**: scaling for audio-driven modulation
+- **Audio On**: enables the internal tone + noise generator
+- **Alpha Debug**: highlights pixels with alpha below 0.98
+
+For details on the rendering pipeline and audio mapping, see `playground/ARCHITECTURE.md`.

diff --git a/ui/HeroKnob.cpp b/ui/HeroKnob.cpp
new file mode 100644
index 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000..8a3df69ffa6bbd74269b69d1c0b6d547ce7e00b7
--- /dev/null
+++ b/ui/HeroKnob.cpp
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+#include "HeroKnob.h"
+
+#include "BinaryData.h"
+
+HeroKnob::HeroKnob(juce::AudioProcessorValueTreeState& state,
+                   const juce::String& parameterId,
+                   const juce::String& labelText)
+    : LayeredKnob(state, parameterId, labelText)
+{
+    // Layer 0 (bottom): Base body - rotates with parameter
+    addLayer(
+        BinaryData::base_body_concrete_png,
+        BinaryData::base_body_concrete_pngSize,
+        true  // rotates
+    );
+
+    // Layer 1: Detail ring - static (scale markings)
+    addLayer(
+        BinaryData::detail_ring_engraved_png,
+        BinaryData::detail_ring_engraved_pngSize,
+        false  // stays fixed
+    );
+
+    // Layer 2: Indicator - rotates with parameter
+    addLayer(
+        BinaryData::indicator_metal_png,
+        BinaryData::indicator_metal_pngSize,
+        true  // rotates
+    );
+
+    // Layer 3 (top): Center cap - static
+    addLayer(
+        BinaryData::center_cap_brushed_metal_png,
+        BinaryData::center_cap_brushed_metal_pngSize,
+        false  // stays fixed
+    );
+
+    // Standard audio knob rotation: 270Â° sweep
+    setRotationRange(-135.0f, +135.0f);
+}

+#pragma once
+
+#include "LayeredKnob.h"
+
+/**
+ * Hero knob control with layered hero textures.
+ *
+ * Uses the same layered asset stack as the TIME knob but allows arbitrary
+ * parameter binding and label text.
+ */
+class HeroKnob : public LayeredKnob
+{
+public:
+    HeroKnob(juce::AudioProcessorValueTreeState& state,
+             const juce::String& parameterId,
+             const juce::String& labelText);
+
+    ~HeroKnob() override = default;
+
+private:
+    JUCE_DECLARE_NON_COPYABLE_WITH_LEAK_DETECTOR(HeroKnob)
+};
